Synopsis: 
The story is about Lisa and Julie, who live very happy marriage, the days could not be better next to his young son Oscar. However, the tranquility of home and family suffer a blow after the police arrest Lisa for murder. 20 years of pressure may drive away the couple, Lisa of her son, but Julien is not willing to bear, he believes in his innocence and prove to be ready for anything. 3 years of virtual seclusion and distance have passed and the love and confidence are strengthened. Julie can not stand and decides to go beyond the bounds of justice out of love for her son and her. 

Production notes: 
Remake French film based on the 2008, 'Pour Elle. "
